mapper.update: update d_safe_activity set activityid=activityid ,activityname=#{activityname} ,activitytime=#{activitytime} ,activearea=#{activearea} ,organiser=#{organiser} ,plan=#{plan} ,process=#{process} ,effect=#{effect} ,recorduser=#{recorduser} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} where activityid=#{activityid}

update d_safe_activity set activityid=activityid ,activityname=#{activityname} ,activitytime=#{activitytime} ,activearea=#{activearea} ,organiser=#{organiser} ,plan=#{plan} ,process=#{process} ,effect=#{effect} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,recorduser=#{recorduser} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} where 1=1 and activityid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and activityid =#{Where_Id} and activityid=#{Where_activityid} and activityname=#{Where_activityname} and activitytime=#{Where_activitytime} and activearea=#{Where_activearea} and organiser=#{Where_organiser} and plan=#{Where_plan} and process=#{Where_process} and effect=#{Where_effect} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and recorduser=#{Where_recorduser} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid}
mapper.select: select t.activityid "activityid", t.activityname "activityname", t.activitytime "activitytime", t.activearea "activearea", t.organiser "organiser", t.plan "plan", t.process "process", t.effect "effect", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.recorduser "recorduser", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_safe_activity t where activityid=#{activityid}

select t.activityid "activityid", t.activityname "activityname", t.activitytime "activitytime", t.activearea "activearea", t.organiser "organiser", t.plan "plan", t.process "process", t.effect "effect", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.recorduser "recorduser", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_safe_activity t where 1=1 and t.activityid=#{activityid} and t.activityname=#{activityname} and t.activitytime=#{activitytime} and t.activearea=#{activearea} and t.organiser=#{organiser} and t.plan=#{plan} and t.process=#{process} and t.effect=#{effect} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.recorduser=#{recorduser} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}

select t.activityid "activityid", t.activityname "activityname", t.activitytime "activitytime", t.activearea "activearea", t.organiser "organiser", t.plan "plan", t.process "process", t.effect "effect", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.recorduser "recorduser", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_safe_activity t where 1=1 and t.activityid=#{activityid} and t.activityname=#{activityname} and t.activitytime=#{activitytime} and t.activearea=#{activearea} and t.organiser=#{organiser} and t.plan=#{plan} and t.process=#{process} and t.effect=#{effect} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.recorduser=#{recorduser} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}
mapper.delete: delete from d_safe_activity where 1=1 and activityid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and activityid =#{Where_Id} and activityid=#{Where_activityid} and activityname=#{Where_activityname} and activitytime=#{Where_activitytime} and activearea=#{Where_activearea} and organiser=#{Where_organiser} and plan=#{Where_plan} and process=#{Where_process} and effect=#{Where_effect} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and recorduser=#{Where_recorduser} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid}
mapper.select: select t.activityid "activityid", t.activityname "activityname", t.activitytime "activitytime", t.activearea "activearea", t.organiser "organiser", t.plan "plan", t.process "process", t.effect "effect", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.recorduser "recorduser", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_safe_activity t where 1=1 and t.activityid=#{activityid} and t.activityname=#{activityname} and t.activitytime=#{activitytime} and t.activearea=#{activearea} and t.organiser=#{organiser} and t.plan=#{plan} and t.process=#{process} and t.effect=#{effect} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.recorduser=#{recorduser} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}

select count(*) from d_safe_activity t where 1=1 and t.activityid=#{activityid} and t.activityid!=#{NoId} and t.activityname=#{activityname} and t.activitytime=#{activitytime} and t.activearea=#{activearea} and t.organiser=#{organiser} and t.plan=#{plan} and t.process=#{process} and t.effect=#{effect} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.recorduser=#{recorduser} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}
